sys_sg_write_back_action_item.name: Edit (MIM Register)
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.template: incident_description={{MIM Register incident_description}}^incident_id_cism={{MIM Register incident_id_cism}}^incident_id_daimler={{MIM Register incident_id_daimler}}^incident_reported={{MIM Register incident_reported}}^initial_communication={{MIM Register initial_communication}}^initial_notification_kpi={{MIM Register initial_notification_kpi}}^mim_confirmation_time={{MIM Register mim_confirmation_time}}^number={{MIM Register number}}^observations_remarks={{MIM Register observations_remarks}}^open_time={{MIM Register open_time}}^p1_actual_time={{MIM Register p1_actual_time}}^pir={{MIM Register pir}}^problem_record_cism={{MIM Register problem_record_cism}}^rca_shared={{MIM Register rca_shared}}^resolution_sla={{MIM Register resolution_sla}}^EQ
